content: the crochet baby diamonds blanket is the perfect weight gift for spring and summer babies it s very light and airy to swaddle your newborn i mashed together a little modern granny with filet crochet i used stitch fiddle to lay out my row it s a nifty website and fun to play with the grids to keep the blanket light i used bernat® baby sport™ yarn in the big balls but only used just over half of each one you will have plenty of yarn left over to make matching booties or hats if you d like
